name: Acolyte Chaston
effect:
Deverenian • Cantor
Daybreak - React: Once per turn, after a melee strike targets a character in your front rank: If it is the first turn, redirect the strike to a character adjacent to the target. If the new target is a Paladin, he gains +2 ATK and +2 AC until end of turn.
"Rejoice, for thou art blessed!"

name: Aellano Sessaran
effect:
Elf • Ranger / Syneri
May equip two Weapons.
React: Once per turn, after killing an opposing character with a melee strike, remove it from the game: Perform a ranged strike equal to the Level of the killed character.
Daybreak - Order: Discard a card: If it is the first turn move forward or backward one rank.

name: Aithon
effect:
Steed
Spend Order: Perform a Charisma check (DC 11). If successful, target each character in your army that shares a subclass with this character. You may move each target forward or backward one rank.

name: Alynna the Fervent
effect:
Deverenian
Saves from Alynna the Fervent's actions have +1 DC for each spell in your discard pile.
Order: Once per turn, remove a spell in your discard pile from the game: Target character within two ranks must make a magic save (DC 15) or be unable to perform actions until end of turn.

name: Ar'bruz
effect:
Nothrog • Unique • Barbarian
Order: Kill another of your Nothrog: Perform a melee strike.
Order: Once per game, target a Warlord you control: Ar'bruz gains the Warlord trait permanently. Kill the target.

name: Ar'tol
effect:
Nothrog • Summoner / Elite Krun Guard
React: After a melee or ranged strike targets Ar'tol: Put up to two Nothrog from your hand into play and move them forward one rank if possible. Shuffle Ar'tol into your deck.
"I'm never alone. Got my axe, for one thing."

name: Aridun of the Stone
effect:
Dwarf Warlord • Gargoyle
React: Once per turn, after target Gargoyle in your army is killed: Reveal the top 10 cards of your deck. You may put a revealed Gargoyle of equal or lower Level than the target into play ready in target's former location in any army. Shuffle the remaining cards into your deck.

name: Armor of Devotion
effect: Spend Order: Target a character: The next time the target suffers wounds this turn, reduce the wounds to zero. If this character is a Cantor the target gains +3 ATK and +3 AC until end of turn.
"Returning the Isles of Light and Shadow to our dominion wouldst prove thy loyalty to the Storm, Prioress Sophique." - The Eternal Emperor

name: Arve Yscar
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Paladin • Lycanthrope
Your other characters in this rank gain the feats Arve Yscar has, at +0.
Order: Once per turn: Until Arve uses this ability again, he gains your choice of RIPOSTE +5, DEFEND +5, or MAGIC RESISTANCE +0.

name: Balios
effect:
Steed
Nightfall - React: After an opposing character performs an Order, spend Balios: If it is not the first turn, move forward or backward a rank.
"Ride with swift hooves. The Fire is coming." - Serolia Calix

name: Baxod Firedancer
effect:
Nothrog • Bard
Baxod Firedancer may cast wizard spells.
React: After Baxod casts a spell: Target Nothrog inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes until end of turn.
"Whether the Ironface succeeds or fails, it will make an epic tale."

name: Beastmaster Eladric
effect:
Free Kingdoms Warlord • Druid
Your Lycanthropes have +2 ATK, AC, and Skill.
React: Once per turn, after one of your Lycanthropes suffers a wound from target opposing character: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 18) or stun.
"Welcome to this place, and do not fear for yourselves."

name: Belinda
effect:
Mercenary • Summoner • Monster
Nightfall - Spend React: After you bring a character into play: If it is not the first turn move the character forward one rank.
"The danger is real-but only if you know the wrong people."

name: Berlian the Stout
effect:
Dwarf Warlord
Order: Target an item in your army and discard a card: Equip the item to a different Dwarf in your army. If you do, ready the item.
"They wish for us to end our alliance with the Deverenians. I will give the humans and elves a chance to prove their words-but why did they bring me to this strange place?"

name: Bishop Ambros
effect:
Deverenian • Cantor
Order: Discard a character card: Target character in your army has a bonus to ATK, AC, and Skill equal to the number of characters in your discard pile until end of turn.
"'Tis by holy sanction that we reclaim this isle."

name: Bran Segula
effect:
Mercenary Warlord • Ranger • 1 Charge
Daybreak - Order: Once per game, remove a Charge: If it is the first turn move forward one rank and gain +2 ATK, AC, and HP permanently.
Nightfall - Order: Once per game, remove a Charge: If it is not the first turn, search your deck for a Dragon of Level 6 or lower, and put it into play adjacent to Bran.

name: Brilliant Bound
effect:
Nightfall - Order: If this isn't the first turn, move forward or backward up to two ranks.
Spend Order: Put Brilliant Bound into play in any first rank as a Level 1 Rogue with +2 ATK, 12 AC, +2 Skill, 2 HP, STEALTH +7 and the ability "Spend Order: Return Brilliant Bound to your hand."

name: Calamity's Steel
effect:
Weapon
React: After this character kills an opposing character: This character has +3 ATK and +1 AC until end of turn.
Order: Spend Calamity's Steel: If this character is a Barbarian, and has +24 or more ATK, ready him.

name: Carg'rag
effect:
Nothrog • Ranger
Daybreak - React: After Carg'rag enters play: If it is the first turn, draw a card.
"'The time for subterfuge is over,' Krun says. Open war is all the Deverenians will understand, and that suits me just fine."

name: Cheadlon
effect:
Elf • Bard • CHARISMA +6
Cheadlon may cast Level 1 and 2 wizard spells.
Order: Once per turn, target non-Warlord character within 3 ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC 20) or cannot perform actions this turn.
"Humans are the same the world over."

name: Clandestine Crest
effect:
You may not equip Armor.
React: After a melee or ranged strike targets this character, discard a card: The strike receives no bonus to the die roll. Illusionists may perform this React once per turn without discarding a card.
"Now we may speak safely. What makes this Emperor such a threat?" - DerRist

name: Clarion
effect:
Familiar
React: Once per turn, after you roll Initiative: Ready a character in your army.
Order: Spend and destroy Clarion: Search your deck for a card named Zenith and equip it to this character spent.
"These birds, they are the key... I'm sure of it!" - Kara Wadreth

name: Close Combat
effect: Order: Move forward one rank if possible. If this character is a Barbarian, he may perform a +4 melee strike. If this character is a Paladin, until end of turn characters in the same rank as him have +3 ATK and AC. If this character is a Ranger, you may move another character in your army forward one rank.

name: Crown of the Isles
effect:
Helm • 2 Charges
Order: Remove X Charges and spend Crown of the Isles: Put a character of Level less than X into play from your discard pile.
Nightfall - React: Once per turn, after this character kills a character: If it is not the first turn put a Charge on the Crown. Necromancers may perform this action more than once per turn.

name: Curse of Broken Spire
effect: Spend Order: Target character within three ranks (Two characters if the caster is an Illusionist) must succeed with a magic save (DC 8 + the caster's Skill + 5 if the caster is a Necromancer) or suffer a wound and, if the caster is a Summoner, you may search your deck for an equal or lower Level character and put it in your hand.

name: Dame Olivia
effect:
Deverenian / Lady in Waiting
Dame Olivia's ranged strikes have a +2 bonus to the roll for each spell in your discard pile.
Order: Once per turn, remove a spell in your discard pile from the game: Perform a +0 ranged strike.
"Sorcery? Surely milady doth jest."

name: Danielle
effect:
Deverenian • Bard
Order: Discard a card: Target character within one rank has +3 ATK and +3 Skill until end of turn.
Nightfall - Order: Once per turn: If it is not the first turn, target character within two ranks has -1 ATK and AC for each action card in your discard pile.

name: Danres
effect:
Dwarf • Cantor
Daybreak - Spend React: Before a Dwarf within one rank suffers wounds: If it is the first turn reduce the wounds by one.
Nightfall - React: Before Danres dies: If it isn't the first turn adjacent Dwarfs have +4 ATK until end of turn.

name: Dazzling Aptitude
effect:
Nightfall - Spend Order: If this isn't the first turn, target character counts as two additional characters for determining illegal ranks until end of turn.
Spend Order: Put Dazzling Aptitude into play in your first rank as a Level 3 wizard with +2 ATK, 10 AC, +4 Skill, 2 HP, and the ability "Spend Order: Return Dazzling Aptitude to your hand."

name: DerRist
effect:
Nothrog Warlord / Votaur
Daybreak - If it is the first turn, DerRist's ranged strikes may target an additional rank away.
Spend Order: Remove the top 6 cards of your deck from the game: This turn is considered the first turn.

name: Destruction
effect:
Dwarf • Barbarian • Hero • Unique
React: After entering play, search your deck for a Level 8 or lower item and equip it to Destruction.
React: Once per turn, after Destruction equips an item: Ready him.
"I deserve no other name."

name: Dorril
effect:
Nothrog • Scout • 1 Charge
Daybreak - Order: Once per turn: If it is the first turn, put a Charge on Dorril.
Nightfall - Order: Once per game: If it is not the first turn, put a Charge on Dorril.
Spend Order: Perform a +3 ranged strike for each Charge on Dorril.

name: Edonal Rowan
effect:
Elf • Scout / Rowan
Daybreak - Spend Order: If it is the first turn perform two +0 ranged strikes that stun instead of wound.
Nightfall - If it is not the first turn Edonal has -4 AC, is Undead and Ethereal and has the ability "React: Before Edonal dies: Succeed with a Skill check (DC 16) to inflict a wound on a character within one rank."

name: Egrart
effect:
Nothrog • Ranger
Egrart may equip two Weapons.
React: After Egrart equips a Weapon: Move him forward one rank.
"Those were your best shots? They're also your last!"

name: Embrace Death
effect: Spend Order: Discard X cards: Target X+1 characters within two ranks who succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or stun. For each failure, you may remove a wound from a character in play.
"You humans think of day and night as merely periods of time..."

name: Entangle
effect:
Druids perform this action without spending.
Spend Order: Target an opposing character within two ranks: Until end of turn, items that give the character bonuses to ATK, AC, or Skill instead give equal penalties.

name: Evoke Crisis
effect:
Ranged strikes from this spell may target an adjacent rank.
Order: Discard any number of cards: Perform a +2 ranged strike. Perform a +0 ranged strike for each card discarded.
"...from the natives in that regard." - Kevrosh Dathar

name: Faceless
effect:
Dwarf • Assassin • STEALTH +7
React: Once per turn, after Faceless performs an action during which he succeeded with a STEALTH check: Ready Faceless.
"This island left its mark on me, as the Deverenians left their mark on all the lands of the Accord. No more."

name: Fascinate
effect:
While this card is in your discard pile, Bards may play it as if it were in your hand and then remove it from the game.
React: After an action that doesn't produce melee strike targets this character: The acting character mest succeed with a perception check (DC 8 + this rogue's Skill) or beome stunned and the action is canceled.

name: Feral Yscarite
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Lycanthrope
Daybreak - If it is the first turn, Feral Yscarite has +3 AC for each Charge on him and the ability "Order: Once per turn: Gain a Charge."
Nightfall - If it is not the first turn, Feral Yscarite has an additional strike (Base +0) whenever he attacks and +2 ATK for each Charge on him.

name: FirRal
effect:
Nothrog • Barbarian / Votaur
Daybreak - React: After FirRal enters play: If it is the first turn move FirRal forward three ranks. Kill him at end of turn.
Nightfall - React: After FirRal enters play: If it is not the first turn he and one of your other Nothrog that has not gained any permanent HP, gain +1 HP permanently.

name: Flaming Spirit
effect:
Elf • Undead
If there is an Illusionist within one rank of Flaming Spirit, he is Ethereal.
If there is a Summoner within one rank of Flaming Spirit, he has +1 HP.
If there is a Necromancer within one rank of Flaming Spirit, wounds from his melee strikes may not be reduced.

name: Fleshstone Gargoyle
effect:
Dwarf • Assassin • Gargoyle • STEALTH +6
Daybreak - Spend React: After entering play: If it is the first turn move Fleshstone Gargoyle to the first rank of an opposing formation.
Spend Order: Target an opposing character within one rank: The target must succeed with a fortitude save (DC 10 + Fleshstone Gargoyle's Skill) or become stunned.

name: Frozen Servant
effect:
Familiar
Daybreak - If this is the first turn, all Illusionists have +2 AC.
React: After wounding target opposing character, discard a card: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 15, DC 18 if the caster is an Illusionist) or become stunned.

name: Ga'dok
effect:
Nothrog
React: After Ga'dok performs an action that killed a character: Put a Charge on him.
Order: Draw a card for each Charge on Ga'dok. Kill Ga'dok.
"Your opinion is of no consequence-DerRist will support neither you nor the Ironface."

name: Gladys Tynron
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Druid • Lycanthrope
Daybreak - React: After Gladys Tynron enters play: If it is the first turn, move target character in any first rank backwards one rank.
Nightfall - React: After Gladys Tynron enters play: If it is not the first turn, move a character forward one rank.

name: Gossamer Mantle
effect:
Spend Order: Choose an opponent who must reveal their hand. You may discard one revealed character. If you do, that opponent draws a card.
React: After you equip Gossamer Mantle: If this character is a Ranger, move forward one rank.

name: Haden Rhys
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Bard
React: After a melee or ranged strike that missed Haden Rhys: Your Free Kingdoms in this rank gain +2 ATK and AC until end of turn.

name: Halcyon
effect:
Familiar
Cleric and Rogue only.
React: Once per turn, after you roll Initiative, stun a character in your army: Stun a non-Warlord character of equal or lower level than your character.
Order: Spend and destroy Halcyon: Search your deck for a card named Nadir and equip it to this character spent.

name: Hex Starsmore
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Barbarian
Daybreak - If it is the first turn, Hex Starsmore's melee strikes are Critical Successes.
"This is just the beginning. If we let the Eternal Emperor reign unchecked, the whole world will be as this. I say we stop him."

name: Icesecret Gargoyle
effect:
Dwarf • Seer • Gargoyle
Spend Order: Remove Icesecret Gargoyle from the game: Put target Gargoyle in your discard pile into your hand.
"Of course we mourn Sjonegaard's passing, but we have not seen him in centuries."

name: Idrol
effect:
Elf • Bard / Ambassador
Order: Discard a card: If Idrol is in the first rank target character has -1 Skill for each character in a discard pile of your choice until end of turn.
"Deverenia attacks my people and yours alike. Only together can we oppose it."

name: Inner Light
effect:
Nightfall - React: After performing a melee strike that killed a character: If this is not the first turn, ready an adjacent character.
Spend Order: Put Inner Light into play in your first rank as a Level 1 Fighter with +4 ATK, 10 AC, +1 Skill, 2 HP POWERATTACK +7 and the ability "Spend Order: Return Inner Light to your hand."

name: Isle of Fire
effect:
Challenge Rating 6
Characters who unstun during the ready phase may attempt a magic save (DC 15) to ready.
Warlords have the ability: "Order: Once per turn, inflict a wound on target character in your army: Until end of turn the target has +5 ATK and inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes."

name: Isle of Ice
effect:
Challenge Rating 6
Stunned characters must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) to unstun during the ready step.
Warlords have the ability: "Order: Once per turn, target a character in your army: Until end of turn the target has +5 AC and +1 HP. Stun the target if possible.

name: Isle of Madness
effect:
Challenge Rating 9
Daybreak - Warlords have the ability "Spend Order: Discard two cards: If it is the first turn, Draw two cards."
Nightfall - After the draw step, if it is not the first turn, each player reveals their hand. The opponent of their choice chooses any number of cards in their hand which are discarded. The player then draws that many cards.

name: Isle of Secrets
effect:
Challenge Rating 7
Daybreak - If it is the first turn, when Isle of Secrets is put into play: Each player discards two cards.
Nightfall - If it is not the first turn, when Isle of Secrets is defeated: All players draw two cards.

name: Isle of Sorrow
effect:
Challenge Rating 7
Daybreak - If Isle of Sorrow is defeated on the first turn, each player searches their deck for a character and puts it into his hand.
Nightfall - If Isle of Sorrow is defeated on a turn other than the first, each player reveals their hand and discards any revealed characters.

name: Isle of Wind
effect:
Challenge Rating 7
Daybreak - If it is the first turn, ranged strikes may target an additional rank away.
Nightfall - If it is not the first turn, characters may not perform ranged strikes.

name: Kalten the Bleak
effect:
Deverenian Warlord
Kalten the Bleak has +1 Skill for each spell in your discard pile.
Order: Discard a spell: Target character within two ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC 8 + Kalten's Skill) or stun.
"Deverenus didst leave something here that may be of use to thy king..."

name: Kara Wadreth
effect:
Free Kingdoms Warlord • Ranger / March Lord
Kara Wadreth may equip two Weapons.
React: After one of your Free Kingdoms enters play, discard a card: Move the character forward or backward one rank.
"Go to the islands, Dukat said. They're practically a paradise, he told me."

name: Ker'zath
effect:
Nothrog • Epic • Barbarian • Hero
Order: Once per turn: Perform a melee strike. Suffer 1 wound.
Order: Once per game: If Ker'zath has 3 or more wounds on him, remove all wounds from him and he permanently gains +3 HP and the text "Ker'zath has an additional strike (Base +0) whenever he attacks, for each wound on him."

name: Kevrosh Dathar
effect:
Mercenary Warlord • Monster
Spend Order: Search your deck for a dungeon, and put it into play if possible, otherwise put it into your hand.
Nightfall - If it is not the first turn, your Monsters have a bonus to ATK equal to half the printed CR of the dungeon in play (Rounded Down).

name: Krasin
effect:
Nothrog • Barbarian
After Krasin performs an attack: Inflict a wound on one of your Nothrog.
"Are you sure that this is the Isle of Ice? Seems a bit warm to me."

name: Lambaste
effect:
Dwarf • Cantor
Wounded Dwarves in this rank have +5 ATK.
Adjacent Dwarves have DEFEND +7.
"We defeated the Abyss! These islands' terrors cannot hope to compare. Onwards!"

name: Lessari
effect:
Mercenary • Monster / Batouri
Order: Once per turn, if there is a dungeon in play, target character within two ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC 10 + the printed Challenge Rating of the dungeon in play) or suffer a wound and become spent.

name: Lightspawn
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
If there is a dungeon in play, Lightspawn has STEALTH +15 and is +1 Level for using STEALTH.
"Come children-Dorath is expecting us, and you know how much we both enjoy our little visits." - Kevrosh Dathar

name: Lord Tuathal
effect:
Deverenian
Daybreak - If it is the first turn Lord Tuathal is a wizard and has the ability "Order: Once per turn: perform a +0 ranged strike."
Nightfall - If it is not the first turn Lord Tuathal is a fighter and has +5 ATK and +2 AC.

name: Loren
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Assassin
Daybreak - React: After Loren enters play: If it is the first turn, perform a +8 ranged strike targeting any equal or lower Level character in play.
Nightfall - If it is not the first turn, Loren's melee strikes inflict an additional wound against spent characters.

name: Luminous Cure
effect:
Nightfall - React: Before target character suffers a wound, inflict a wound on one of your characters: If it is not the first turn, reduce the wounds on the target by one.
Spend Order: Put Luminous Cure into play in your first rank as a Level 1 cleric with +1 ATK, 13 AC, +3 Skill, 2 HP, MEDICINE +7, and the ability "Spend Order: Return Luminous Cure to your hand."

name: Madnessfire Gargoyle
effect:
Dwarf • Barbarian • Gargoyle
Daybreak - React: After Madnessfire Gargoyle enters play, inflict a wound on him: If it is the first turn he permanently gains +4 ATK.
Nightfall - React: Once per turn, after a wound is removed from Madnessfire Gargoyle: If it is not the first turn he permanently gains an additional melee strike (Base +4) whenever he attacks.

name: Madriga
effect:
Deverenian Warlord • Cantor
Daybreak - Order: Inflict a wound on Madriga: If it is the first turn, your characters have +3 ATK until end of turn.
Nightfall - Order: Once per turn, remove a wound from Madriga: If it is not the first turn target another Deverenian who gets +1 HP permanently.

name: Mercy's Edge
effect:
Weapon
React: After this characters targets a melee strike: He has +2 ATK for the strike. If the strike hits, the target is stunned instead of wounded.
"Leave them alive. It looks like a beautiful night to be helpless." - Skrim Spindlespleen

name: Nadir
effect:
Familiar
Cleric and Wizard only.
Your characters with Nightfall have +2 AC. If it is not the first turn, they also have +2 Skill.
Order: Spend and destroy Nadir: Search your deck for a card named Clarion and equip it to this character spent.

name: Nadlon Dathar
effect:
Mercenary • Monster • Ss-eleer
Dungeons in play have +2 Challenge Rating.
React: Once per turn, after you put a dungeon into play: Nadlon Dathar gains +1 HP permanently.
"A Sutek King? Hssst-speak not to me of our lesser cousins."

name: Naro Yscar
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Ranger • Lycanthrope
Your Rangers in play are considered to have the Lycanthrope trait.
Your Lycanthropes in play are considered to have the Ranger trait.

name: Nemtok
effect:
Nothrog • Druid
Daybreak - If it is the first turn, your Nothrog inflict an additional wound with melee strikes.
Nightfall - If it isn't the first turn, your Nothrog in this rank have POWERATTACK +5.

name: Neutralize
effect: Order: Discard X cards: Inflict a wound on target character within one rank, whose Level is equal to X+1.
"...you would do well to learn..."

name: Nildrach
effect:
Elf • Assassin • STEALTH +7
Daybreak - Spend React: After entering play: If it is the first turn Nildrach has -1 HP permanently and moves to the first rank of an opposing army.
Nightfall - Order: Once per turn, discard a card: If it is not the first turn perform a melee strike that inflicts an additional wound against spent characters.

name: Nostrum's Whisper
effect:
Weapon
React: After performing an action that put target character into play, spend Nostrum's Whisper: The character permanently gains +3 ATK, and +3 Skill (and +1 HP, if this character is a Summoner).
React: After this character inflicts a wound on a summoned character: Kill that character.

name: Phantasmal Panther
effect:
Familiar
Nightfall - Order: If it is not the first turn, spend Phantasmal Panther: Phantasmal Panther performs a melee strike as if it were a Level 3 Rogue Assassin with +4 ATK, 14 AC, 1 HP, 5 Skill, and POWERATTACK +5.
"Do not make the mistake of thinking we natives defenseless during the day." - Beastmaster Eladric

name: Pravian
effect:
Elf • Paladin • Undead • Ethereal
Daybreak - React: After entering play: If it is the first turn, move forward one rank and gain POWERATTACK +10 permanently.
Nightfall - React: After entering play: If it is not the first turn permanently gain +1 HP and "After you roll Initiative: Opposing characters within one rank must succeed with a magic save (DC 11) or suffer a wound."

name: Prioress Sophique
effect:
Deverenian • Unique • Cantor • Seer
Daybreak - React: After Sophique enters play: If it is the first turn, characters in your front rank have +5 ATK and +5 AC until end of turn.
Nightfall - React: After Sophique enters play: If is not the first turn, search your deck for a card and put it on top of your deck.
"Even here the Storm doth weep for our sins."

name: Quest
effect:
Dwarf • Paladin
Daybreak - React: Once per turn, after wounds are reduced or removed from Quest: If it is the first turn, he gains +1 HP permanently.
Nightfall - If it is not the first turn Quest has +4 AC.

name: Rattle the Bones
effect:
Necromancers perform this action without spending.
Spend Order: Remove up to three characters in your discard pile from the game: Until end of turn your characters gain a bonus to ATK equal to twice the number of characters removed. Your Undead gain an equal bonus to AC.

name: Refuse to Yield
effect: React: After an action that does not produce melee strikes targets a character in this rank: Redirect that action to this character.
"Didst thou think I would simply give in to you, elf? Clearly you've not fought a true knight before." - Sir Kolden Aedroud

name: Robert Mason
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Ranger
Order: Once per turn: Move a Ranger in your army forward or backward one rank.
"The elves once fought against us, and now by our side. I fear that the Deverenians won't follow their example."

name: Rouse
effect:
Dwarf • Bard
Daybreak - React: After Rouse enters play: If it is the first turn ready up to two characters in your army.
Nightfall - If it isn't the first turn, you must have a character in rank four to play Rouse and he enters play in rank 1 stunned with 1 wound.

name: Ruby Staff of Selection
effect:
Weapon
This is a Faith Set item.
Order: Once per turn, spend a cleric in your army and name a subclass: Target character gains the subclass until end of turn.
"I do not choose those worthy of Kor's blessing. The staff does." - Lambaste

name: Sadina Gleson
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Ranger
Daybreak - Order: Once per turn: If it is the first turn, move forward one rank.
Nightfall - If it is not the first turn, Sadina Gleson has an additional strike (Base +0) whenever she attacks.
"But there's not so much as a breeze here..."

name: Scetis
effect:
Elf • STEALTH +8
Scetis has +1 Level while in an opposing formation.
Nightfall - If it is not the first turn, Scetis may enter play into the front rank of any army.
"I do my best work after dark, and no ghost is going to stop me."

name: Serolia Calix
effect:
Elf Warlord • Seer
Serolia Calix is a wizard and a cleric.
Daybreak - If it is the first turn your Elves have the ability "Order: Once per turn: Succeed with a Skill check (DC 20) to inflict a wound on a character within one rank."
Order: Kill one of your Elves: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. You may put a revealed spell into your hand.

name: Shadan Alder
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Lycanthrope
Shadan Alder enters play spent.
Nightfall - If it is not the first turn Shadan Alder enters play in rank 3 and has +3 ATK, AC, and Skill, +2 HP, and two additional strikes (Base +0) whenever he attacks.
Spend Order: Return Shadan Alder to your hand.

name: Shadowlurkers
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
Dungeons have +3 Challenge Rating.
Shadowlurkers has +3 ATK, AC, & Skill if there is a dungeon in play.
"Nothing comparess to the ssport to be had on the Isless of Light and Sshadow come ssunsset." - Kevrosh Dathar

name: Sidor the Avenged
effect:
Deverenian / War Mage
Daybreak - React: Before Sidor the Avenged dies: If it is the first turn, stun a character within one rank.
Nightfall - If it is not the first turn, Sidor the Avenged has +2 ATK for each spell in your discard pile.

name: Sir Francis DeGraves
effect:
Deverenian • Paladin • RIDING +4
Daybreak - Order: Once per turn: If it is the first turn, ready and equipped Steed.
Nightfall - If it is not the first turn, Sir Francis DeGraves has a bonus to ATK equal to the Level of the highest Level Steed he has equipped.

name: Sir Kolden Aedroud
effect:
Deverenian • Paladin • Illusionist
Sir Kolden Aedroud is a fighter and a wizard and enters play as if he were one Level higher.
Paladins in this rank have +2 ATK and RIDING +2.
Illusionists in this rank have the ability "React: Once per turn, after a melee or ranged strike targets this character: Redirect the strike to an adjacent character."

name: Skrim Spindlespleen
effect:
Nothrog Warlord • Assassin
Nightfall - Order: Once per turn: If is is not the first turn: Reveal the top 10 cards of your deck. Each of your Nothrog may equip one revealed Weapon that they may legally equip. Discard all remaining revealed cards.
"Arm up. Malrog wants no survivors."

name: Spectre of Madness
effect:
Elf • Undead
While Spectre of Madness is in the discard pile your Necromancers have the ability "Spend Order: Remove Spectre of Madness from the game and target an item within 2 ranks: Succeed with a Skill check (DC 8 + item's Level) to destroy the item."
Spend Order: Perform a +4 ranged strike.

name: Spiteful
effect:
Dwarf • Assassin
Adjacent Dwarfs have DEFEND +6.
Nightfall - React: After target opposing character kills an adjacent Dwarf: If it is not the first turn melee strikes by Assassins in your army inflict an additional wound against the target until end of turn.
"The King is dead. Has our sense of duty followed him?"

name: Stockpile
effect:
Dwarf
Spend Order: Return target item within one rank to its owner's hand.
Nightfall - React: Once per turn, after target Dwarf in your army equips an item: If it is not the first turn the target may perform an additional Order after the current one.

name: Subvert
effect:
Scouts perform this action without spending.
Spend Order: Look at the top 5 cards of any deck. Discard one of those cards, and remove one of those cards from the game. Return the rest to the top of that deck.
"Your alliance was over before it began." - Zevil Adinerach

name: Sustaining Aura
effect: Spend Order: Ready target lower-Level unstunned character: If this character is a Cantor, the target has +5 ATK, AC, and Skill until end of turn. If this character is a Druid, you may move the target forward or backward one rank. If this character is a Seer, the target's next die roll this turn is a Critical Success.

name: Symbol of Unity
effect:
Armor
This is a Faith Set item.
Order: Once per turn, spend a cleric in your army and name a subclass: Until end of turn characters in your army with that subclass have +2 ATK, AC, and Skill for each Faith Set item equipped to this character.

name: Temper
effect:
Dwarf • Barbarian / Blackstone Raider
Daybreak - React: After an opposing character kills a Dwarf: If it is the first turn put Temper into play from your hand in rank three.
Nightfall - React: After target character kills a Dwarf in your army, discard a card: If it is not the first turn Temper's next melee strike this turn against the target is a Critical Success.

name: Terbero
effect:
Elf • Necromancer
React: After one of your Elves dies, discard 1 card: Put a Level 1 Elf from your discard pile into play.
"What need have we of allies, when we create our own every day?"

name: The Bastion of Bascaron
effect:
Challenge Rating 8
It is the first turn.

"I don't know what's inside, or who's guarding it, or even how to get back, but Dukat thinks it's vital. That's enough." - Kara Wadreth
"But you needn't enter alone." - Beastmaster Eladric

name: The Cohorts' Ark
effect:
This is a Faith Set item.
Order: Once per turn, spend a cleric in your army: Search your deck for a Faith Set item and put it into your hand.
Order: Once per turn, spend a cleric in your army: This character may use abilities on Faith Set items an additional time this turn.

name: Theodore d'Ilchant
effect:
Deverenian • Paladin • RIDING +3
Daybreak - After Theodore enters play: If it is the first turn, he gains +3 ATK permanently. Search your deck for a Level 5 or lower Steed and put it into your hand.
Nightfall - After Theodore enters play: If it isn't the first turn: Move him forward one rank, and give target character in your first rank +5 ATK and AC until end of turn.

name: Thrust
effect: Order: Discard any number of cards: Perform a +0 melee strike. This character has +5 ATK for this strike for each card discarded.
"...here they are the essence of being, of living, of surviving..."

name: Turgan
effect:
Nothrog • Druid
Adjacent Nothrog have +1 HP.
Nightfall - Order: Once per turn: If it is not the first turn, put a Charge on Turgan. Until end of turn your Nothrog have +2 ATK for each charge on Turgan.
"Flames coat the night, so darkness never falls. Unnatural."

name: Twisted Shade
effect:
Elf • Assassin • Necromancer • SCRIBE +5
Twisted Shade is a wizard and a rogue and enters play as if one Level higher.
Order: Kill target Elf you control: Do one of the following: All characters in the rank the target was in must succeed with a reflex save (DC 13) or suffer a wound; Move a character that was within one rank of the target into the rank the target was in.

name: Valdania Calix
effect:
Elf • Druid
Daybreak - Spend Order: After target opposing character moves without spending or stunning: If it is the first turn the target must succeed with a will save (DC 16) or spend, stun if already spent.

name: Vauxgen
effect:
Deverenian • Paladin / Chromatic Knight
Nightfall - If it is not the first turn, other evil Deverenians in this rank have +3 ATK and +3 AC.
"She was named after Deverenus' wife? Methinks these people have been separated from Deverenia too long."

name: Vermin Swarm
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Scout • Monster
Daybreak - Order: Once per turn, if it is the first turn: Perform a +2 ranged strike.
Nightfall - Order: Once per turn, if it is not the first turn: Move forward or backwards one rank.
"Yes my minions, go for the eyes!"

name: Ways of War
effect: Order: If this character is a Ranger, perform a +7 ranged strike. If this character is a Paladin, ready up to two Steeds in your army. If this character is a Barbarian, this character's next melee strike this turn may target an additional rank away.

name: Wheels within Wheels
effect: React: After this rogue targets a melee or ranged strike: If this character is an Assassin the strike inflicts an additional wound. If this character is a Bard, the target has -3 ATK, AC, and Skill until end of turn. If this character is a Scout you may retarget the strike to a character an additional rank away.

name: Yscarite Sentry
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Druid • Lycanthrope • Monster
Daybreak - If it is the first turn, your characters in play have +2 AC while Yscarite Sentry is in the discard pile.
Nightfall - If it is not the first turn, your characters in play are Lycanthropes if you have two or more copies of Yscarite Sentry in your discard pile.

name: Zenith
effect:
Familiar
Cleric and Fighter only.
Your characters with Daybreak have +2 ATK. If it is the first turn, they instead have +5 ATK.
Order: Spend and destroy Zenith: Search your deck for a card named Halcyon and equip it to this character spent.

name: Zevil Adinerach
effect:
Elf Warlord • Bard • Assassin • CHARISMA +6
Order: Once per target per turn, Discard a card: Until end of turn target character within 2 ranks has -2 ATK, AC, and Skill, and one of your other Elves has +2 ATK, AC, and Skill.
